Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the biggest difference to how this impacted my learning would be that GenAI feedback is instant, whereas feedback from a teacher takes a certain amount of time. this impacts my learning as in my degree, i am completing weekly lab reports on different content, however a big part of marking is the structure of a lab report and skills which need to be reciprocated in each report to gain full marks. most of the time, i am submitting another lab report before even receiving feedback from the last one, so an error i made in one report may carry through for a multitude of my submissions, leading to me losing more marks than needed

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: not necessarily, although GenAI will usually state something like "this is a great detailed response..." whereas teacher feedback is more minimal speech and a bit blunt at times

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: another difference would probably be the detail between each response, as teachers have sooo many things to mark, it would be difficult for them to create a detailed and structured response for small assignments
